description: Borrowed from German Kohlrabi, from Kohl (“cabbage”) + Italian rape (“turnips”), from cavoli rape, the plural of cavolo rapa (“cole rape”).

nouns.description: kohlrabi (countable and uncountable, plural kohlrabis or kohlrabies)

entries.meaning: Brassica oleracea var. gongylodes, a variety of the cabbage, having a turnip-shaped edible stem.
